Key Match Events: Musa Barrow scored a crucial goal in the 62nd minute
Despite missing a penalty, Gambia maintained pressure and eventually broke through
Post-Match Reflections: This win places the Scorpions in second place in Group A with five points after four matches, just one point behind leaders Tunisia
Madagascar has only two points from four games and is at the bottom of the group
Miscellaneous Highlights: Madagascar had a few chances, but goalkeeper Baboucarr Gaye kept a clean sheet
